text: Narayanganj is a city in central Bangladesh. The Port of Narayanganj is an important shipping and industrial center. It is also a center of business and industry, especially making and selling jute and the textiles. It is nicknamed the Dundee of Bangladesh because of its many jute mills. ==References== * Website of Narayanganj City Corporation Category:Cities in Bangladesh Category:Dhaka Division
title: Narayanganj
